name: Letter Dice
description:
This application rolls a dice with letters instead of the numbers 1 to 6. It can be used to get a random letter from either A to Z or a custom set for all sorts of board games or in the office to pick a random file.

Features:
- List of the diced letters.

- Either roll A...Z or choose the letters, numbers and special characters to be rolled

- use the shake gesture to roll or tap and hold

- support for the iPhone 6 and 6+
